arguments.argument:
ini_open("gg2.ini")
ini_write_real("MyBots", "Number (in total)", global.mybotNumber) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Team", global.mybotMode) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Reinforcement Learning", global.mybotLearningMode) ini_write_string("MyBots", "Bot Name Prefix", global.mybotNamePrefix) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Runners enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_SCOUT]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Firebugs enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_PYRO]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Rocketmen enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_SOLDIER]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Overweights enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_HEAVY]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Healers enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_MEDIC]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Constructors enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_ENGINEER]) ini_write_real("MyBots", "Riflemen enabled", global.mybotClasses[CLASS_SNIPER])
ini_close()
